title: üì∞ World News Intelligence Pipeline
description: Fetch and analyze world news from top global sources using a reliable single-stage AI analysis pipeline, prioritizing source diversity.

runMode.title: Actor Operation Mode
runMode.description: Choose the primary task for this run. 'General News Scraper' crawls news sites. 'Crime Intelligence Engine' performs targeted searches. 'Morning News Briefing' generates an AI video summary.

source.title: News Source (News Scraper Mode Only)
source.description: Select the news category to collect from. Articles will be fetched from different sources within this category first.

crimeCityScope.title: Crime Intelligence: City Scope
crimeCityScope.description: Scope of cities to scan for crime intelligence. 'Major Cities' checks key metros. 'All Cities' sweeps the entire database.

customFeedUrl.title: Custom RSS Feed URL
customFeedUrl.description: Provide a custom RSS feed URL (if 'Custom' selected).

maxArticlesPerSource.title: Max Articles Per Source
maxArticlesPerSource.description: Maximum number of articles to scrape from each source URL listing.

maxArticles.title: Maximum Total Articles
maxArticles.description: Global limit on total articles fetches across all sources.

webhookUrl.title: Real-Time Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: Optional URL to POST high-priority incidents to (e.g. your Next.js API endpoint).

heygenTemplateId.title: HeyGen Template ID (Briefing Mode)
heygenTemplateId.description: Optional: Override the HEYGEN_TEMPLATE_ID environment variable for the morning briefing.

runTestMode.title: Admin Test Mode (Bypasses ALL External API Costs)
runTestMode.description: Setting this to true bypasses external API calls (Brave/OpenAI), enabling zero-cost testing. **DO NOT ENABLE IN PRODUCTION.**
